root.name: Wonder Boy in Monster World
root.description: Release InformationWonder Boy in Monster World was originally released in the U.S. on the Sega Genesis, in October of 1991. It was also released on the European Sega Mega Drive and back-ported to the Sega Master System. There was also a TurboGrafx/PC Engine release and rebranding of the game, which was known as The Dynastic Hero. Lastly, both Wonder Boy in Monster World and The Dynastic Hero blessed the Wii Virtual Console back in 2007.
